attributes.action: visa charges for visitors to uk
attributes.additional_details: the visa charge would help pay for police and  HHS There were 37.9 million visits to the UK in 2018.  needing a visa would help with the cost at £10 a visa
attributes.background: start to charge for a visa when visiting the uk

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

Visitors from some countries are already required to pay a visa fee to enter the UK.

You could start a petition calling for the Government to extend visa fees to visitors to whom these arrangements do not currently apply, if that is what you would like to see happen.
